name: TokenProxy
description: TokenProxy. Helps to reduces the size of the deployed bytecode for automatically created tokens, by using a proxy contract.

functionDecorators.name: getTokenProxyInterfacesVersion
functionDecorators.description: Tells the current version of the token proxy interfaces.

functionDecorators.name: implementation
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves the implementation contract address, mirrored token image.
